title: 3 and Out - Raiders/Ravens MNF Thriller, Manning Bros Broadcast, Throwback Seahawks, Full Week 1 Reaction, Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Raiders/Ravens MNF Thriller, Manning Bros Broadcast, Throwback Seahawks, Full Week 1 Reaction, Mailbag
description:
John reacts to the Raiders thrilling OT win over the Ravens in the MNF opener, and what the Ravens did to lose the game that was inexcusable. He also explains why he loved Peyton and Eli Manning making their game broadcast debut, why this version of the Seahawks has a throwback feel from their Super Bowl teams, and why the Titans replacement for former OC Arthur Smith is a huge downgrade. He also recaps the rest of the Week 1 slate, and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag.

Make sure you follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
